message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you and its importance to me. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000 to meet you halfway.  This offer reflects the value of the product to both of us, and I believe it's a fair compromise. Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,300,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
